typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empno as string,
		ename as string,
		job as string,
		hiredate as string,
		sal as string,
		deptno as string,
		Department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		deptno as string,
		dname as string,
		location as string,
		department as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Dept
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Department),
	EmpCount = count(empno)) ~> Aggregate1
Aggregate1, Dept join(Aggregate1@Department == Dept@department,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		Department = {Aggregate1@Department},
		EmpCount,
		Deptno = deptno,
		Dname = dname,
		Location = location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		orderId as string,
		orderTotal as string,
		itemName as string,
		itemQty as string,
		name as string,
		location as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['agrjoin.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
